sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import Context from '../../components/Context' import './Temperature.css' import { mapCodesToImage } from '../../components/constants' import DetailsTemperature from './DetailsTemperature' export default function Temperature() { const arrData = useContext(Context) const data = arrData.weatherData[0] let srcWeather if(data){ srcWeather = mapCodesToImage[data.weather.icon] } return ( <> {data && (
{data.temp > 0 ? '+' : '−'}

{Math.round(Math.abs(data.temp))}°

{arrData.nameCity}: {data.weather.description.toLowerCase()}

0 ? '+' + Math.round(Math.abs(data.app_temp)) + ' °' : '−' + Math.round(Math.abs(data.app_temp)) + ' °' } />
)} ) }
